summary: After Ray decides to transition from female to male, Ray's mother, Maggie, must come to terms with the decision while tracking down Ray's biological father to get his legal consent.
cast: Elle Fanning|Linda Emond|Susan Sarandon|Naomi Watts|Andrew Polk|Marcos A. Kim|Maria Dizzia|Tate Donovan|Sam Trammell|Susan Blackwell|Maxwell Simkins|Mattea Conforti|Amelia Bullock|Meghan Gutierrez|Ira Jackson|Dylan Marocola|Sebastian Marocola|Ismaelpeter Casillas Nelson|Madelyne Rose Schmitt|Rob Yang
keywords: female to male transition|gender transition|transgender|lesbian grandmother|single mother
title: 3 generaciones
